channel.title: Server Question
channel.description:
Hey Guys.
I'm currently enjoying my experience on everybody's servers, and I'm now into making my own. Thing is, my windows isn't up to date, as it is a copy, so I don't get updates etc. So my question is, [b]'Is it possible to make a server without the need of firewalls to make a port?'[/b]
If I haven't made sense, just say and I'll try to explain a little more detail.
Thanks for your time.

item.title: Server Question
item.dc:creator: @legendzpker legendzpker
item.description:
@legendzpker wrote:

yes just lower the firewall and u get a windows firewall with the copy , also you should have installed a firewall that u should buy because windows firewall dont stope verything

Read full topic
